introduction: SYNOPSISAt the crossroads of life and death, Su-hi grows stronger due to her will to live. Leaving behind her dark past, Su-hi moves into the home of Chairman Nam of the Namwu Corporation to become his secretary. Su-hi feels compassion for Chairman Nam who has become blind. Chairman Nam's son knows of Su-hi's past. He gets a wrong idea about the relationship between Su-hi and his father. One day, Su-hi finds Young-ran with Chairman Nam's help. But when Chairman Nam dies of a fall, Su-hi has nowhere to go leading her to her old life. Su-hi goes to greet Sang-min who had saved her life and loves her but he dies of an accident. Young-ran finds Su-hi collapsed from exhaustion. Watching Young-ran wail, Dong-suk repents tormenting Su-hi and he goes to her and holds her故事在生与死的十字路口，隋被生命的意志所强化。清理黑暗过去的秀熙，担任南和企业（Nam-Woo Enterprise）总裁的秘书。向不信任的总统表示同情的苏希，误解了他与总统之间的关系，他的儿子了解他的过去。有一天，在大韩民国总统的帮助下，总统找到了他的儿子，总统开始了他的旧生活。他想见见生命恩人桑明，爱自己，但是桑敏因意外死亡。曾经受过苏熙伤害的城西，对这个年轻人发出疲惫的苏熙的哭声，哭了起来，悔改养育。
